title: Expressing Your Opinion about a Movie

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to share your opinion about a movie with a friend. Let's start with the basics.

data.tip: The 'eux' at the end sounds like the 'oo' in 'book' but with rounded lips.

content.title: First Impressions
content.setting: You just left the cinema with your friend, Camille.

conversation_flow.title: Give your overall opinion about the movie
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Alors, le film... J'ai trouvé ça fantastique !

extract_info.user_opinion_adj: Extract the adjective the user uses for the movie

conversation_flow.title: Share your opinion on the actors
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oui, le film était {user_opinion_adj}. Et les acteurs ?

conversation_flow.title: Ask for your friend's opinion
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: J'ai trouvé les acteurs bons aussi

content.text: Great start! Now let's learn how to discuss specific parts of the movie and agree or disagree.

data.tip: The 'é' has an 'ay' sound, as in 'say'. The final 'ble' is soft.

content.title: Discussing Details
content.setting: You continue your discussion with Camille.

conversation_flow.title: Mention a specific part you liked
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Moi, j'ai beaucoup aimé ! Qu'est-ce que tu as aimé dans le film ?

conversation_flow.title: State if you found the story believable
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, la fin était bien ! Et l'histoire, tu as trouvé ça crédible ?

conversation_flow.title: Disagree with your friend
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Vraiment ? Moi, j'ai trouvé l'histoire pas très crédible

content.text: Excellent! Finally, let's learn how to recommend the movie and suggest what to do next.

data.phrase: Je ne recommande pas ce film

data.tip: The 'en' sound is nasal. Try to say 'oh' while breathing out through your nose.

data.meaning: Shall we go for a drink?

content.title: What's Next?
content.setting: You're wrapping up the conversation with Camille.

conversation_flow.title: Say if you would recommend the movie
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah d'accord. C'est intéressant. Alors, tu recommandes le film ?

conversation_flow.title: Suggest seeing another movie next time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Moi aussi. Qu'est-ce qu'on peut voir la prochaine fois ?

conversation_flow.title: Suggest getting a drink to discuss it
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oui, bonne idée ! On en parle ?
